synopsis.text: Morio Kita's captivating science-fiction tale, Dr. Mambo, unfolds as the charismatic protagonist and his improbable accomplice, Jibako the thief, embark on a thrilling quest to restore Princess Laura's rightful rule over the kingdom of Eden. The duo must confront the cunning President Capo, who has seized control and threatens the stability of their world. Prepare for an enthralling journey filled with intrigue, camaraderie, and the pursuit of justice in this one-shot anime adaptation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
